text: Katherine "Kate" Brown (born June 21, 1960) is an American politician. She was raised in Minnesota. She became the 38th Governor of Oregon on February 18, 2015 after the resignation of John Kitzhaber. Brown is the state's second female governor, after Barbara Roberts. She is the first openly bisexual governor in United States history. ==References== ==Other websites== Category:1960 births Category:Living people Category:American LGBT politicians Category:Bisexual people Category:Governors of Oregon Category:Politicians from Minnesota Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: Kate Brown
